title: Advertising
description: The information related to advertising activity related to the experience event

xdm:adViewability.title: MRC Viewability
xdm:adViewability.description: The runtime measured viewability specific details such as player volume, library version, window status, viewport/ad measured dimensions, etc.

xdm:adAssetReference.title: Ad Asset Reference
xdm:adAssetReference.description: Asset information about the ad captured by the experience event.

xdm:duration.title: Ad Length/Duration
xdm:duration.description: Length of ad asset in seconds.

xdm:adAssetViewDetails.title: Ad Asset View Details
xdm:adAssetViewDetails.description: View details for the ad playback captured by the experience event.

xdm:playerName.title: Ad Player Name
xdm:playerName.description: The name of the player responsible for rendering the ad.

xdm:podPosition.title: Ad Position in Pod
xdm:podPosition.description: The position (index) of the ad inside the parent ad break. The first ad has index 0, the second 1, and so on.

xdm:podName.title: Ad Break Name
xdm:podName.description: The friendly name of the ad break.

xdm:podOffset.title: Ad Break Offset
xdm:podOffset.description: The offset, in seconds, of the ad break inside the main content.

xdm:loads.title: Loads
xdm:loads.description: Describes the intention to play a timed media asset. It does not measure success, as the user might abandon the content before the first frame is viewed.

xdm:completes.title: Completes
xdm:completes.description: Indicates if a timed media asset was watched to completion - this does not necessarily mean the viewer watched the whole video; viewer could have skipped ahead.

xdm:timePlayed.title: Time Spent
xdm:timePlayed.description: Describes the amount of time spent by a user on a specific timed media asset.

xdm:federated.title: Federated
xdm:federated.description: Indicates if an experience event was created through federation.

xdm:conversions.description: A pre-defined action on a website triggered a conversion event to be fired

xdm:firstQuartiles.description: A digital video ad has played through 25% of its duration at normal speed.

xdm:impressions.description: Impression(s) of an advertisement to an end user with the potential of being viewed.

xdm:midpoints.description: A digital video ad has played through 50% of its duration at normal speed.

xdm:starts.description: A digital video ad has started playing.

xdm:thirdQuartiles.description: A digital video ad has played through 75% of its duration at normal speed.
